name: FLOR-A and ADAM Space Dance
description:
Press F to go into fullscreen mode.

Try to grab notes. Some can only be touched by the similar dancers. Some need both dancers.

Can be played with solo or duo. Duo recommended. 'u'

Movement:

  • WASD / arrow keys controls one dancer
  • Hold left mouse button to control the other dancer. It will push away from the mouse, so try to drag away from the dancer to make it go the other way

Made during Movie Game Jam 2018.

Inspired by the movie WALL-E.
